setup_posture.feedback: Solid, athletic stance with good width providing a stable base.

backswing_mechanics.feedback: Significant lateral sway off the ball and over-rotation causes the club to go well past parallel.

downswing_impact.feedback: Good aggression, but the long backswing forces an early release (casting) to square the face.

balance_finish.feedback: Weight transfers successfully to the left side, though the finish shows some recoil.

consistency_athleticism.feedback: You generate excellent speed and athleticism, though the loose mechanics likely reduce consistency.

what_was_good: Very athletic setup and motion showing high potential for power.
Good commitment to getting weight onto the lead side at the finish.
what_was_bad: Significant lateral sway (moving your head to the right) during the backswing.
Overswinging (club goes past parallel) creates timing issues.

immediate_focus.why_it_matters: Sliding your body to the right moves your swing center, making it very difficult to strike the ball cleanly and consistently.
immediate_focus.simple_fix: Focus on rotating your shoulders around a steady spine rather than sliding back. Imagine your head is resting against a wall and keep it there while you turn.

confidence_note: Analysis is based on a clear face-on view. A down-the-line angle would help confirm swing plane mechanics.
